Title: Relates to debt relief from predatory debt collectors
Summary: Relates to debt relief from predatory debt collectors; authorizes a debtor to bring an action or counterclaim against a principal creditor who employs deceptive acts or practices in collecting a debt from the debtor.
LawCode: Amd ยง602, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to debt relief from predatory debt collectors
